name: Minus World
description:
Made for Interstellar Game Jam 4.

I wrote the game in Rust. I used the Macroquad game library to render the screen and get keyboard inputs, and a simple 2D game utilities library that I wrote called 'xf'. The level was built in Tiled. Overall I spent about 20 hours making the game.

Controls:

  • Left and Right arrows: Move
  • Up arrow: Enter Door
  • Down arrow: Dash (requires item)
  • Z: Jump

github: https://github.com/mmducasse/dimension

Feel free to post your completion time!
